meanings.sent1: Some people with triskaidekaphobias avoid the thirteenth floor in buildings.
meanings.sent2: Triskaidekaphobias can make someone feel uneasy on Friday the 13th.
meanings.sent3: When John's triskaidekaphobias acted up, he refused to sit at a table with thirteen chairs.
meanings.sent4: Her triskaidekaphobias was like a dark cloud looming over her whenever the thirteenth day of the month arrived.
meanings.sent5: The triskaidekaphobias gripped her heart with icy fingers whenever she saw the number thirteen.

meanings.definition: A person who has an irrational fear of the number thirteen.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a triskaidekaphobias and always avoids the number thirteen.
meanings.sent2: Triskaidekaphobias often feel anxious when they encounter the number thirteen.
meanings.sent3: The triskaidekaphobias in our group insisted on changing the dinner reservation to avoid sitting at table thirteen.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a triskaidekaphobias trapped in a room with thirteen clocks ticking loudly.
meanings.sent5: The triskaidekaphobias trembled at the sight of the number thirteen, convinced it brought bad luck.
